meanings.definition: A person who applies lacquer to an object.
meanings.sent1: The skilled lacquerer carefully painted the wooden table with a shiny coating.
meanings.sent2: The lacquerer at the furniture factory adds a protective layer to each chair.
meanings.sent3: The lacquerer accidentally spilled the paint, turning the floor into a slippery mess.
meanings.sent4: Like a diligent lacquerer, she meticulously covered every inch of the vase with a glossy finish.
meanings.sent5: The lacquerer's expertise transformed the dull box into a gleaming masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: She decided to lacquer the old dresser to give it a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman will lacquer the wooden frame to protect it from moisture.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally lacquered his fingers together while trying to fix the broken chair.
meanings.sent4: The artist lacquered the canvas with vibrant colors, creating a stunning painting.
meanings.sent5: The sun lacquered the leaves with a golden hue, making the forest glow.
